data.eml:eml: A new Holopothrips species (Thysanoptera: Phlaeothripidae) damaging Mollinedia (Monimiaceae) leaves in Southern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cavalleri, Adriano, Kaminski, Lucas A. (2007): A new Holopothrips species (Thysanoptera: Phlaeothripidae) damaging Mollinedia (Monimiaceae) leaves in Southern Brazil. Zootaxa 1625: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273948
